Crown authority laws were recently revoked due to a faction ultimatum or revolt. It will take time before the realm's nobles are willing to support the revocation of their remaining laws.

The [Root.Culture.GetName] host will permanently settle throughout the §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§!, convert the dominant culture and religion in one province, and fully replenish the levies of settlements throughout the new realm with their own.
